segments.text: Looking at the girl waiting for a cookie, I feel a bit happy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so innocent and excited.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see her brother struggling to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool he's on looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor is getting closer to them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit worried that they might slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the cookies in the jar look really good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it without anyone getting hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a mix of excitement and danger.
segments.speaker: PAR
